about_the_game:
Embark on a mathematical journey through our enchanting castle filled with engaging challenges and delightful surprises. K-5 children can practice their number and math skills in various ways, matching words with the numbers, addition, and subtraction, with the option to turn on multiplication and division or even extend out the number range far above and below the starting 0 to 10. Go down the random path to get a mix of question types for a more advanced challenge. Stars reset each day, so come push yourself to make a new high score. Older children and audits can come for the brain teasers with fun breaks in the mini-game arcade.

Features:

  • Dynamic Gameplay: Navigate through various math rooms, dodge spikes and earn Stars by answering questions correctly, then spend those stars to unlock exciting new skins and mini-games, or keep a hold of them to push up your daily high score. Memory Match starts with 4 cards and adds on as you keep clearing the board. Spire run gets faster and harder the longer you go. Remember more moves as the Simon-style Dance Party goes on longer.
  • Tailor Your Challenge: Start with Addition, Subtraction, and Word Match. When you’re ready, turn on Multiplication and Division. Spice things up with the Random room that’ll give you any of your selected math modes. Set your number range anywhere from -10000000 to 10000000.
  • Unlockable Content: Discover 8 charming skins and conquer 4 captivating mini-games: Memory, Tic-Tac-Toe, Dance Party, and Spire Run.
  • Rewarding System: Check in each day to beat your high scores for Stars and each minigame.
  • Intuitive Controls: Enjoy seamless gameplay with touchscreen, mouse, or keyboard inputs, including support for controllers.
  • Original Pixel Art: Immerse yourself in the game's enchanting world, crafted with love in Aseprite.

Developers


Graphics and Game Design - Nicole Haynie
Original Sound Track - Silly Little Muse sillylittlemuse on Linktree
Sound Effects - Wesley Barros @wbaudio on X

legal_notice: This game was developed using the Godot Engine.
name: Runi's Math Castle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Navigate the Math Castle solving addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and number matching to earn Gold Stars unlocking Characters and Mini-Games: 3 in a row Tic-tac-toe, Memory card match, timed jumping in Spire Run, and Dance Party patterns. Come play again to beat your high score!
